name: Doodle Town
description:
Doodle Town is a casual placement game. Players need to place different buildings or facilities into the canvas to create a picture of the town and complete the condition each level required.

Control:

Left Click: Select Modules, Use painting function

Drag: Move Modules

Right Click: leave Layer mode
